channel.title: SBI Cards & Payment Services Ltd on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in SBI Cards & Payment Services Ltd on TechnoStreet

item.title: SBI Cards Q2 Review - Receivables Growth Strong, Revolver Mix Falling Again A Dampener: Prabhudas Lilladher
item.description: SBI Cards Q2 Review - Receivables Growth Strong, Revolver Mix Falling Again A Dampener: Prabhudas Lilladher Yields fell as higher yielding revolver mix decreased to 24% from 26% in Q1 FY23 of overall receivables.

item.title: SBI Cards Shares Decline As Q2 Profit Misses Estimates
item.description: SBI Cards Shares Decline As Q2 Profit Misses Estimates SBI Cards Q2 Results 2022-23: Net profit rose 28% year-on-year but dipped sequentially on higher operating spends.

item.title: SBI Cards Q2 Results: Net Profit Rises But Misses Estimates
item.description: SBI Cards Q2 Results: Net Profit Rises But Misses Estimates SBI Cards' net profit missed estimates and stood at Rs 526 crore in the second quarter on financial year 2023.
